Flow.description: The flow creates Account CTCs to connect Business Accounts and Corporate Tracking Codes. Related tasks: SFDCI-1458, SFDCI-1551.

formulas.name: noCodeFoundError
formulas.expression: IF({!Not_Found_and_Codes_are_Selected}, '*No available Corporate Tracking Code found for the selected type "' & SUBSTITUTE({!chosenCodeRT}, '_', ' ') & '" in the picklist.', '')

Flow.label: Account CTCs

screens.description: These are the active Corporate Tracking Codes related to this Business Account: List each Account CTC in this format: [Record Type] - [Corporate Code Name] - Active / Inactive.
